detail_desc: Soft pile bag decoration with appliqués and embroidered details. Metal carabiner hook at the top. Polyester padding. Length approx. 13 cm.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a round neck, text print on the front and a straight-cut hem.
Fitted dress in a rib-knit viscose blend with a polo neck, long sleeves and a slit in one side.

Body in microfibre and lace with a push-up bra. Underwired, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage, adjustable shoulder straps and an opening with a hook-and-eye fastening at the back. Lined gusset with press-studs and a high cut at the back.
Short, round-necked sports top in fast-drying functional fabric with short sleeves and a panel at the hem with a knot detail at the front and gathers at the back.

V-neck playsuit in a crinkled plumeti chiffon weave with an opening and button at the back of the neck, long sleeves with decorative hole embroidery and trumpet cuffs and an elasticated seam at the waist. Crocheted lace trim around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Jersey inner shorts.
Wide, cold shoulder top in slub jersey with narrow shoulder straps and short sleeves.
Cardigan in a soft, airy, fine-knit viscose and linen blend with long, wide raglan sleeves and a seam with a drawstring at the hips.
Pyjamas in soft, organic cotton jersey. Top with a press-stud on one shoulder (except in sizes 1½-4Y). Bottoms with an elasticated waist and ribbed hems.
Net bag in braided paper straw with two handles at the top. Size approx. 40x45 cm.

Shirt in a soft Tencel™ lyocell weave in a relaxed fit. Collar, buttons down the front, a yoke with a pleat at the back, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Hat in a soft rib-knit cotton blend. Turn-up at the hem with a small appliqué.
Boxer shorts in cotton jersey with short legs, an elasticated waist and lined front.
Fitted top in soft, ribbed viscose jersey with a turtle neck and long sleeves.
Fine-knit socks in a soft cotton blend with elasticated, glittery scalloped tops.

Dungaree dress in washed cotton denim with a chest pocket and adjustable straps with metal fasteners. Seam at the waist with buttons at the sides, a fake fly, front and back pockets and a raw-edge hem. Unlined.
Slightly shorter top in waffled jersey with an appliqué on the front and print motifs on the back and sleeves. Gently dropped shoulders and long sleeves with ribbed cuffs.
Hipster briefs in cotton jersey with a mid waist with narrow elastication and a lined gusset.
Long shirt in airy, printed crêpe with a collar, buttons down the front, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.

Wide, knee-length dress in a cotton weave with a large, frill-trimmed collar and narrow ties at the neck. Long, wide sleeves with narrow elastication and a flounce at the cuffs and a gathered seam for added volume at the hem. Unlined.
Joggers in velour with an elasticated drawstring waist and tapered legs with ribbed jersey hems.
Short dressing gown in cool satin with lace sections. Wrapover front with concealed ties at one side, a sewn-in tie belt at the waist and 3/4-length, scallop-trimmed sleeves.
Scarf in woven fabric with fringes on the short sides.
Shorts in stretch cotton twill an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button, fake front pockets, real back pockets and lace-trimmed hems.
CONSCIOUS EXCLUSIVE. Fully lined, patterned swimsuit in a straight cut at the top with narrow shoulder straps that tie at the back. Low-cut back with gathers and narrow elastication.
Shirt in a viscose weave with a collar, buttons down the front and a yoke at the back. Long balloon sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Ankle-length trousers in an airy viscose weave. High waist with covered elastication and a small frill trim, side pockets and tapered legs.
Dress in an airy, patterned weave with a small frilled collar with a drawstring and opening at the top, and long raglan sleeves with narrow elastication at the cuffs.
5-pocket, knee-length shorts in washed, superstretch denim with an adjustable, elasticated waist and zip fly and button.
Strappy top in a textured weave with a deep V-neck front and back, spaghetti shoulder straps and narrow horizontal ties at the back. Satin lining. The polyester content of the top is partly recycled.
Soft jersey, boxy-style top with a sequined motif on the front, dropped shoulders and short sleeves.

prod_name: Beverly HW Loose Mom Fit Dnm
detail_desc: 5-pocket, ankle-length jeans in washed denim with a high waist, zip fly and button and gently tapered legs.
Short T-shirt dress in soft jersey with short cap sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Fitted vest top in stretch ribbed viscose jersey.
Fitted top in airy jersey with a double-layered polo neck and long sleeves.
Pyjamas in soft ribbed cotton jersey with contrasting colour ribbing. Long-sleeved top. Bottoms with an elasticated waist.
Lace push-up bra with moulded, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Long cardigan in a soft, loose knit with gently dropped shoulders, long sleeves and no buttons.
Lightweight jacket in soft, sequined velour. Zip down the front with a circular tab, and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Jersey lining.

Lined triangle bikini top with wavy, overlocked edges and padded cups with removable inserts that shape the bust and provide light support. Narrow adjustable shoulder straps that cross at the back, wide elastic at the hem and an adjustable metal fastener at the back.
Top in sweatshirt fabric with an appliqué on the front, gently dropped shoulders and long sleeves. Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
T-shirts in soft, printed cotton jersey.

Long-sleeved shirt in woven fabric with an easy-iron finish. Turn-down collar, classic front, darts and a yoke at the back, narrow cuffs with adjustable buttoning, and a rounded hem. Slim fit with narrow shoulders and a tapered waist.
Cotton cap with a sweatband in a cotton weave, and elastication at the back.
Sleeveless top in cotton jersey with a print motif. Frill trim around the armholes.
Cotton jersey briefs in various designs with an elasticated waist and lined gusset.
Joggers in soft cotton sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and ribbed hems.
Hipster briefs in soft microfibre and lace with a mid waist, lined gusset, wide sides and full coverage at the back.
A-line dress in lace with a small opening and button at the back of the neck and cap sleeves. Lined.

Padded jacket in woven fabric with a sheen. Lined hood with a detachable faux fur trim and a small stand-up collar. Zip down the front, diagonal, zipped side pockets and ribbing at the cuffs. Lined. Polyester filling.
5-pocket jeans in washed, stretch cotton denim with a high waist, zip fly and slim legs.
Fitted top in a jacquard-knit viscose blend with a high collar and long sleeves.
5-pocket ankle-length jeans in washed, stretch denim with hard-worn details, a regular waist, zip fly and button and super-skinny legs with uneven, raw-edge hems.
Knitted hat with earflaps and ties under the chin. Jersey lining.
Long-sleeved nursing top in soft, ribbed cotton jersey with a unique nursing feature. The design includes a double layer at the top to help retain warmth while allowing easier nursing access.
Short skirt woven in a cotton blend with broderie anglaise. High waist with covered elastication and a frill-trimmed wrapover front with ties at one side. Jersey lining.
Long-sleeved top in stretch jersey with a wide neckline and gathers at the sides for best fit over the tummy.
Shirt in soft, checked cotton flannel with a collar, buttons down the front, a chest pocket and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs.
Hat in a soft, rib-knit cashmere and wool blend.

Knee-length dress in woven fabric with a square neckline and short puff sleeves with narrow elastication. Low-cut back with a cut-out section and horizontal ties, a gathered seam at the waist and a voluminous, flared skirt.
Sleeveless playsuit in stretch denim made from a cotton blend with narrow shoulder straps, a V-neck, buttons at the top and a seam at the waist.
Leggings in washed, stretch denim with an elasticated waist and fake front pockets. One pair with back pockets.
Wrapover bodysuits in soft jersey made from organic cotton. Long sleeves and press-studs at one side and at the crotch.
Knee-length shorts in printed, lightweight sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with an elasticated, drawstring waist, side pockets and an open back pocket.
Rib-necked T-shirt in soft, organic cotton jersey coloured with natural dyes.
Ankle-length cigarette trousers in a stretch weave with a zip fly, concealed hook-and-eye fastening, and regular waist with concealed elastication. Side pockets, fake back pockets and tapered legs.
Top in airy, patterned chiffon with crossover, plumeti flounces at the front and narrow adjustable shoulder straps.
Hoop earrings with a textured finish. The zinc content of the earrings is recycled.
Zip-through hoodie in lightweight organic cotton sweatshirt fabric with a soft brushed inside. Jersey-lined hood, a concealed zip down the front with a chin guard, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
T-shirt in soft viscose jersey with a seam centre front and a twisted detail at the hem.

Ankle-length suit trousers in a herringbone weave made from a linen blend with a regular waist, zip fly and concealed hook-and-eye fastener. Side pockets, welt back pockets and tapered legs with creases.
Fitted top in a fine rib knit with long sleeves and a ribbed neckline.
Trousers in patterned sweatshirt fabric with a text print, elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and ribbed hems.
Round-necked T-shirt in soft cotton jersey.
Hipster briefs in lace and microfibre with a low waist, lined gusset, wide sides and cutaway coverage at the back.

Parka in cotton twill with a lined, drawstring hood, zip and wind flap with concealed press-studs down the front, handwarmer pockets with a press-stud and patch front pockets with a flap. Adjustable press-stud fastenings at the cuffs, a drawstring at the hem and a single back vent. Lined.
Thong briefs in lace with a low waist, lined gusset and string back.
Cardigan in soft, fine-knit cotton with long sleeves, buttons down the front and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
V-neck top in an airy weave with pleats on the shoulders, short, raglan flutter sleeves, and a rounded hem. Loose fit.

Double-breasted trenchcoat woven in a cotton blend. Notch lapels with a buttonhole, a loose yoke at the back and side pockets. Detachable belt at the waist, long sleeves with a tab and adjustable fastening at the cuffs, and a single back vent. Lined.
